boba_teas.name: Classic Milk Tea
boba_teas.description: A smooth blend of black tea, creamy milk, and chewy tapioca pearls. The timeless favorite for boba lovers.

boba_teas.name: Taro Milk Tea
boba_teas.description: Made with sweet taro root and milk, this pastel purple drink is creamy, nutty, and slightly earthy.

boba_teas.name: Matcha Green Tea Latte with Boba
boba_teas.description: A rich Japanese matcha green tea with smooth milk and chewy tapioca pearls for a refreshing twist.

boba_teas.name: Brown Sugar Boba Milk
boba_teas.description: Fresh milk swirled with brown sugar syrup and caramelized tapioca pearls. Sweet, creamy, and Insta-worthy.

boba_teas.name: Thai Milk Tea
boba_teas.description: A bold black tea sweetened with condensed milk and topped with tapioca pearls. Rich and aromatic.

boba_teas.name: Honeydew Milk Tea
boba_teas.description: A sweet and refreshing honeydew-flavored tea blended with milk for a fruity and creamy taste.

boba_teas.name: Strawberry Fruit Tea with Popping Boba
boba_teas.description: A vibrant, caffeine-free fruit tea with real strawberry puree and popping boba for a juicy finish.

boba_teas.name: Oolong Milk Tea
boba_teas.description: Smooth oolong tea with a floral aroma, perfectly balanced with milk and chewy tapioca pearls.

boba_teas.name: Lemon Green Tea
boba_teas.description: A bright and tangy mix of green tea and fresh lemon juice, perfect for a refreshing citrus kick.

boba_teas.name: Lychee Fruit Tea
boba_teas.description: A sweet and floral fruit tea infused with juicy lychee flavor and served with lychee jelly or popping pearls.
